name: Jasio
overview: Jasio is a timed puzzle-solving game based on Sokoban it was created by Piotr Kazmierczak aka Cerber. The player's task requires placing all the balls in designated holes before the time runs out. The balls may be pushed in every direction not blocked by the wall or other ball. Once each ball is on a marked spot, the level is complete. Getting stuck in the corner means the loss of life.
